skills.name: Anchor Hook

upgrades.description: Reduces the cooldown of anchor hook  In the winter they point south, in the summer they point north, easy!

upgrades.description: Increases the base damage of anchor hook  Draw me like one of your French girls.

upgrades.name: Pneumatic Spoon

upgrades.name: Alien Sweetener

upgrades.name: Palladium Teabag Chain

upgrades.name: Magnetic Anchor

upgrades.name: Double Glazed Royal Porcelain

skills.name: Ink Propulsion

upgrades.description: Causes an enemy to be slowed while a sticky bomb is stuck to them.  50% OFF! It has already self destructed.

upgrades.description: Increases the base damage of your double pistol and bike blaster shots.  Some other female bounty hunter is also after this head.

Hold the skill button to either remote destroy your turret or mount it again when close. While on the bike your other skill becomes nitro boost.

upgrades.name: Fresh Chocolate Milk

upgrades.name: Bovinion And Chicken Comic

upgrades.name: Triple Cowbells Of Honor

skills.description: After his brain got zapped in the anomaly, Yuri managed to recreate parts of it inside his new fancy jetpack, allowing him to alter the flow of time in an area around himself.

upgrades.name: Chrono Rift
upgrades.description: Reduces the cooldown of Time Warp.  Contains huge wormhole. Keep away from children.

upgrades.name: Regeneration Pod
upgrades.description: Allied droids and Awesomenauts inside your time warp are healed over time.  Want to feel 20 years younger? Now you can! With our patented Turn-back-time technology.

upgrades.name: Pod Pack Deluxe With Banana
upgrades.description: Adds a lifesteal effect to your laser while time warp is active.  Because you are not worth it.

upgrades.name: Flash Forward
upgrades.description: Allied robots and Awesomenauts inside your time warp will move and fight faster.  Ends combat and shoetalk with your centipede girlfriend quicker.

upgrades.name: Spacetime Continuity Device
upgrades.description: Provides debuff immunity during the time warp.  Special moments will last forever. Literally.

upgrades.name: Time Primer
upgrades.description: Increases slowing effect of Time Warp.  By folding time, we have managed to copy our products many, many times.

skills.name: Jet Pack
skills.description: The pride and joy of Yuri: it alters the flow of time, shoots laserbeams, drops mines, can insult enemies in over six million forms of communication and oh yeah, it can fly.

upgrades.name: Power Pills Turbo
upgrades.description: Increases maximum health.  Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.

upgrades.name: Med-i'-can
upgrades.description: Automatically regenerate health.  Hello... anyone there? Please get me out of here!!!

upgrades.name: Space Air Max
upgrades.description: Increases movement speed.  Fashionable and Fast.

upgrades.name: Barrier Magazine
upgrades.description: Provides a damage absorbing shield.  Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.

upgrades.name: Piggy Bank
upgrades.description: Gives 100 Solar.  This product was brought to you by Zork industries, exploiting Zurians since 2780.

upgrades.name: Baby Kuri Mammoth
upgrades.description: Reduces the effect of all debuffs  "LOOK!!! A FLYING ELEPHANT!"
